title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\BatchPredictionJob\InputConfig
name: InputConfig
description:
Configures the input to [BatchPredictionJob][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.BatchPredictionJob].

See [Model.supported_input_storage_formats][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.Model.supported_input_storage_formats] for Model's supported input formats, and how instances should be expressed via any of them.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.BatchPredictionJob.InputConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.gcs_source
params.description: The Cloud Storage location for the input instances.

params.name: data.bigquery_source
params.description: The BigQuery location of the input table. The schema of the table should be in the format described by the given context OpenAPI Schema, if one is provided. The table may contain additional columns that are not described by the schema, and they will be ignored.

params.name: data.instances_format
params.description: Required. The format in which instances are given, must be one of the [Model's][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.BatchPredictionJob.model] [supported_input_storage_formats][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.Model.supported_input_storage_formats].
